com.pega.pegarules.pub.util

Interface IStringBuilderFactory


  • public interface IStringBuilderFactory
    The IStringBuilderFactory interface is common to pooled and nonpooled implementations invoked from StringBuilderFactory.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String COPYRIGHT 
      static java.lang.String VERSION

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.StringBuilder acquire()
      Acquire an instance of StringBuilder.
      java.lang.StringBuilder acquire(int requested)
      For compatibility with 7.1 StringBuilderFactory.
      java.lang.String exchangeForString(java.lang.StringBuilder stringBuilder)
      Return the StringBuilder instance back to the pool (if using pooling) and return its string value.
      java.lang.String exchangeForString(java.lang.StringBuilder stringBuilder, boolean report)
      For compatibility with 7.1 StringBuilderFactory Return the StringBuilder instance back to the pool (if using pooling) and return its string value and log nonstandard builders.

      Output statistics.

      • release

        void release(java.lang.StringBuilder stringBuilder,
             boolean report)
        For compatibility with 7.1 StringBuilderFactory. Return the StringBuilder instance back to the pool (if using pooling) and log nonstandard builders. This currently behaves the same as the method without the report parameter.
        Parameters:
        stringBuilder -
        report -

      • exchangeForString

        java.lang.String exchangeForString(java.lang.StringBuilder stringBuilder)
        Return the StringBuilder instance back to the pool (if using pooling) and return its string value.
        Parameters:
        stringBuilder -
        Returns:
        String value of the builder.

      • exchangeForString

        java.lang.String exchangeForString(java.lang.StringBuilder stringBuilder,
                                   boolean report)
        For compatibility with 7.1 StringBuilderFactory Return the StringBuilder instance back to the pool (if using pooling) and return its string value and log nonstandard builders. This currently behaves the same as the method without the report parameter.
        Parameters:
        stringBuilder -
        report -
        Returns:
        String value of the builder.
